import pandas as pd

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

import bar_chart_race as bcr

import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")

df_deaths_chart
source.d20842d3:
df_death_chart_simplified = df_deaths_chart.iloc[::2]
bcr.bar_chart_race(df=df_death_chart_simplified,
                              filename=None,
                              orientation='h',
                              sort='desc',
                              n_bars=10,
                              label_bars=True,
                              steps_per_period=10,
                              period_length=500,
                              figsize=(5, 3),
                              cmap='dark24',
                              title='Covid-19 Deaths from 2020-01-22 to 2020-07-27',
                              bar_label_size=8,
                              tick_label_size=7,
                              fig=None)

source.981a35c2:

source.8d2e96a2:
x = new_df_grouped_full.index
y = new_df_grouped_full['Confirmed']
z = new_df_grouped_full['Active']
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize = (15,5))
ax.plot(x,y,z ,linewidth = 1.5)
ax.legend(['Confirmed Cases','Active Cases'])
ax.set(title = "COVID - 19 Cases from 2020-01-22 to 2020-07-27", xlabel = "Date", ylabel = "Number of COVID -19 Cases")

source.55c4dbe0:
df_full_grouped_2 = pd.read_csv('../input/corona-virus-report/full_grouped.csv', parse_dates= ['Date'])
df_new_full_grouped_2 = df_full_grouped_2.set_index(df_full_grouped_2['Date']).drop(labels = ['Date','Country/Region','WHO Region'], axis = 1)
df_new_modified_full_grouped_2 = df_new_full_grouped_2.set_index(df_new_full_grouped_2.index.strftime('%B'))
df_new_modified_full_grouped_2
source.e0dc5004:

    month_list.append(i)
month_set = set(month_list)
month_set
source.081066c7:
confirmed_month_list = []
deaths_month_list = []
recovered_month_list = []
active_month_list = []
new_deaths_month_list = []
new_cases_month_list = []
new_recovered_month_list = []
for i in month_set:
    x = df_new_modified_full_grouped_2[df_new_modified_full_grouped_2.index == i]
    confirmed_month_list.append(x['Confirmed'].sum())
for i in month_set:
    x = df_new_modified_full_grouped_2[df_new_modified_full_grouped_2.index == i]
    recovered_month_list.append(x['Recovered'].sum())
for i in month_set:
    x = df_new_modified_full_grouped_2[df_new_modified_full_grouped_2.index == i]
    deaths_month_list.append(x['Deaths'].sum())
for i in month_set:
    x = df_new_modified_full_grouped_2[df_new_modified_full_grouped_2.index == i]
    active_month_list.append(x['Active'].sum())
for i in month_set:
    x = df_new_modified_full_grouped_2[df_new_modified_full_grouped_2.index == i]
    new_deaths_month_list.append(x['New deaths'].sum())
for i in month_set:
    x = df_new_modified_full_grouped_2[df_new_modified_full_grouped_2.index == i]
    new_cases_month_list.append(x['New cases'].sum())
for i in month_set:
    x = df_new_modified_full_grouped_2[df_new_modified_full_grouped_2.index == i]
    new_recovered_month_list.append(x['New recovered'].sum())
